name: sharingServicePicker(_:sharingServicesForItems:proposedSharingServices:)
desc: Invoked to allow the delegate to customize exactly what appears in the sharing service picker before it is presented.
declaration:
optional func sharingServicePicker(_ sharingServicePicker: NSSharingServicePicker, 
           sharingServicesForItems items: [Any], 
           proposedSharingServices proposedServices: [NSSharingService]) -> [NSSharingService]
